mapper.insert: INSERT INTO snsboard (bno, writer, upload_path, file_loca, file_name, file_real_name, content) VALUES (snsboard_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileLoca}, #{fileName}, #{fileRealName}, #{content})
